title: The Film Crew Complete 2007 With Extras DVDrip (Rifftrax MST3K)
description:
The.Film.Crew.Complete.2007.With.Extras.DVDrip.(Rifftrax.MST3K)

The.Film.Crew.1_Hollywood.After.Dark.With.1.Extra.DVDrip.mkv
The.Film.Crew.2_Killers.From.Space.With.1.Extra.DVDrip.mkv
The.Film.Crew.3_Wild.Women.Of.Wongo.With.2.Extras.DVDrip.mkv
The.Film.Crew.4_The.Giant.Of.Marathon.With.2.Extras.DVDrip.mkv

The Film Crew: Hollywood After Dark (aka Walk the Angry Beach)
The Film Crew release 2007.07.10 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1076810/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1076810/</a>  
Original Film release 1968 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0055612/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0055612/</a>  
718x480 crop=00:00:02:00 729,882,113bytes 1h20m07s
Extra at the end = Ode To Lunch

The Film Crew: Killers from Space
The Film Crew release 2007.08.07 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1091769/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1091769/</a>  
Original Film release 1954 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0047149/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0047149/</a>  
718x480 crop=00:00:02:00 826,726,331bytes 1h23m49s
Extra at the end = Did You Know... Five Outtakes

The Film Crew: Wild Women of Wongo
The Film Crew release 2007.09.11 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1125804/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1125804/</a>  
Original Film release 1958 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0052394/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0052394/</a>  
700x480 crop=04:00:16:10 1,088,291,844bytes 1h26m07s
Extras at the end = Make Film Crew Dance and Goodbye, Wongo-Style

The Film Crew: The Giant of Marathon (aka La battaglia di Maratona)
The Film Crew release 2007.10.09 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1177909/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1177909/</a>  
Original Film release 1959 <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0052604/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0052604/</a>  
720x326 crop=82.04.10.78 1,300,239,605bytes 1h45m49s
Extras at the end = An Apology From Mike Nelson and Commentary By Walter S. Ferguson

Handbrake 0.10.1.6962 20150308
Video: AVC encode
Anamorphic Loose, Deinterlace=Slower
FPS 29.97 Constant, Preset=Very Slow, Quality RF=20.0
Audio: AC3 Passthru 192Kbps
Riffers: Bill Corbett, Kevin Murphy, Mike Nelson 

* all four movies have the extras for that movie appended at the end
* the cropping was done based on the movies
* Giant of Marathon has it's segments/credits cropped but the other segments/credits still have black bars on each side
* each movie has custom chapters that are named and include the extras

Since the movie portion of Giant of Marathon on the DVD had very large black bars on each side, the cropping was significant: crop=82.04.10.78. This means the segments and credits are partially cropped out. It's only very noticeable for some credits near the top or bottom.

Also, in the extra for Killers from Space, Kevin is cut off when he says "choose one of these outtakes from this conven[ient]..." This cutoff also happens on the DVD.

Big thanks to the online MST3K community for the DVD sources. And to the one online member in particular who made this possible: thank you!!!

If these encodes were enjoyable, you don't have the original discs and you can afford them, please consider picking up some the official Film Crew DVDs. The artwork, packaging, menus and extras with the DVDs are fantastic. If you don't want discs and/or you want to make an anonymous donation, go to Rifftrax (same 3 core performers) and pay via CCard, PPal, Bitcoin/Dogecoin/Litecoin or wallet payment apps at
